tool_description: Predictive football analytics API. Get expected scores from quantitative models and statistically fair odds for upcoming and historical matches. Find discrepancies by comparing ratings to final results and market prices. Quantify team performance and trends using the Metrx Index algorithm.
title: Metrx Factory

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description:
Returns a list of countries for which teams and metrics are available.
There are no parameters to provide.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 1 minute`
`Max. countries returned: 5`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metrx-factory.p.rapidapi.com/v1/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metrx-factory.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

api_list.name: Matches
api_list.description:
Returns a list of matches for given parameters.

Both historical and upcoming matches are supported. If no parameters are provided then all upcoming matches are returned. The time span covering next matches ranges between 8 hours for *Basic* and 60 hours for paid subscriptions.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 30 seconds`
`Max. matches returned: 5`

optional_parameters.name: teamId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a team competing in a match. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: teamIds
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of two team identifiers. For head-to-head matches only.

optional_parameters.name: maxStart
optional_parameters.description:
The upper bound of the time span in which matches may start (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: venue
optional_parameters.description:
The venue where the team referenced by the `teamId `parameter competes in a match (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `H` Home, `A` Away

optional_parameters.name: teamType
optional_parameters.description:
The type of teams that compete in a match (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `C` Club team, `N` National team

optional_parameters.name: competitionStageId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of the competition stage to which a match is related. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: minStart
optional_parameters.description:
The lower bound of the time span in which matches may start (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description:
The time zone used to interprete the `minStart` and `maxStart` parameters and to format date values in the API response.
**Default**: UTC

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

id.description: The unique identifier of the match. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the matchId parameter required by other operations.

start.description: The date when the match went or will go live.

schedule.description: The scheduled start of the match.

competitionStage.description: The competition stage this match is related to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the stage. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionStageId parameter required by other operations.

mode.description: The competition mode of the stage.

competition.description: The competition this stage is part of.

id.description: The unique identifier of the competition. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionId parameter required by other operations.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams).

homeTeam.description: The team competing at home ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

awayTeam.description: The team competing at away ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

time.description: The match time when these scores were valid.

home.description: The number of home team goals.

away.description: The number of away team goals.

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description:
Returns a list of competitions that match the given parameters.
Competitions are divided into stages which differ in playing mode (league vs. knock-out). If no parameters are provided then all competitions hold in this year are returned.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 30 seconds`
`Max. competitions returned: 5`

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: nameLike
optional_parameters.description:
The full or partial name of a competition (case-insensitive).
**Min. length**: 4 chars

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/competitions.htm) for a list of available competitions.

optional_parameters.name: year
optional_parameters.description:
The year a competition is hold. If a competition ends in another year that it was started then any included year matches.
E.g. 2020 matches competitions from 2019-20, 2020 and 2020-21.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

id.description: The unique identifier of the competition. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionId parameter required by other operations.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams). International competitions are not domestic.

year.description: The year the competition is hold.

turnOfYear.description: Status whether the competition is hold over multiple calendar years, e.g. starts in summer and finishes in the following spring.

stages.description: The individual competition stages that the competition is divided into.

id.description: The unique identifier of the stage. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionStageId parameter required by other operations.

mode.description: The competition mode of the stage.

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.description:
Returns a list of teams that match the given parameters.
At least one of the request parameters is required.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 30 seconds`
`Max. teams returned: 5`

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: competitionStageId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of the competition stage in which teams compete. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: countryId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of the country which the teams come from. Use the `Get Countries` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: nameLike
optional_parameters.description:
The full or partial name of a team (case-insensitive).
**Min. length**: 4 chars

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

api_list.name: Match Odds History
api_list.description:
Returns the trend of average market odds for a single match.

Still in beta phase this endpoint will be soon available for the *Mega* subscription. Note that testing with the *Basic* subscription will result in a 403 HTTP error (Forbidden).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metrx-factory.p.rapidapi.com/v1/market/match-odds-history"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metrx-factory.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Competition Performance Indices
api_list.description:
Returns a snapshot of global competition performance indices sorted by rank in ascending order.
Separate index lists are maintained for club/national team and domestic/international competitions.

If no parameters are provided then the latest club team competitions ranking is returned in absolute index format. For details about index calculation and factors refer to the documentation.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 1 minute`
`Max. performances returned: 5`

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
The format applied to index values (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `ABS` Absolute, `REL` Relative.
**Default**: ABS
BASIC subscriptions support only `ABS`.

optional_parameters.name: maxRank
optional_parameters.description: The maximum rank of performances according to index value (inclusive).

optional_parameters.name: minRank
optional_parameters.description: The minimum rank of performances according to index value (inclusive). Minimum value for BASIC subscriptions is 31.

optional_parameters.name: teamType
optional_parameters.description:
The type of teams for which performances should be included (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `C` Club team, `N` National team
**Default**: C

optional_parameters.name: domestic
optional_parameters.description: Status whether included performances should include domestic or international competitions.

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description:
The time zone used to interpret the `date` parameter and to format date values in the API response.
**Default**: UTC

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
The date for which performance indices should be evaluated.
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`
**Default**: Now

optional_parameters.name: competitionIds
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `competitionId` parameter. A comma-separated list of competition identifiers for which performances should be included. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: competitionId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a competition for which the performance should be included. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

result.description: A performance list for the requested team type and index format.

teamType.description: The type of teams covered by the performance list.

format.description: The index format used to present performance indices.

competition.description: The competition this performance belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the competition. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionId parameter required by other operations.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams).

index.description: The index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The position in the index ranking.

stagePerformances.description: The performances of individual competition stages.

stage.description: The competition stage this performance belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the stage. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionStageId parameter required by other operations.

mode.description: The competition mode of the stage.

index.description: The stage index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The position in the overall stage index ranking.

api_list.name: Team Performance Indices
api_list.description:
Returns a snapshot of global team performance indices sorted by rank in ascending order.
Separate index lists are maintained for club and national teams. The indication of projections controls which data should be collected and has direct impact on the payload and billed credits.

If no parameters are provided then the latest club team ranking is returned with only the main index projection in absolute index format. For details about index calculation and factors refer to the documentation.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 1 minute`
`Max. performances returned: 5`

optional_parameters.name: projections
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `projection` parameter. A comma-separated list of projections applied when building the result (case-insensitive).

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
The format applied to index values (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `ABS` Absolute, `REL` Relative.
**Default**: ABS
BASIC subscriptions support only `ABS`.

optional_parameters.name: minRank
optional_parameters.description: The minimum rank of performances according to main index value (inclusive). Minimum value for BASIC subscriptions is 51.

optional_parameters.name: teamId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a team for which the performance should be included. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: teamType
optional_parameters.description:
The type of teams for which performances should be included (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `C` Club team, `N` National team
**Default**: C

optional_parameters.name: countryId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a country whose teams are included in the result. Use the `Get Countries` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: competitionStageId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a competition stage whose competing teams are included in the result. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: maxRank
optional_parameters.description: The maximum rank of performances according to main index value (inclusive).

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description:
The time zone used to interpret the `date` parameter and to format date values in the API response.
**Default**: UTC

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
The date for which performance indices should be evaluated.
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`
**Default**: Now

optional_parameters.name: projection
optional_parameters.description:
A single projection applied when building the result (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `I` Main index, `VI` Venue index, `IT` Index trend, `LIC` Last index change, `LMD` Last match details
**Default**: I

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#team-pfm-idx-proj-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: teamIds
optional_parameters.description: An alternative to the `teamId` parameter. A comma-separated list of team identifiers for which performances should be included. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

result.description: A performance list for the requested team type and index format.

teamType.description: The type of teams covered by the performance list.

format.description: The index format used to present performance indices.

team.description: The team this performance belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

index.description: The main index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The team's position in the main index ranking.

homeIndex.description: The team's performance in the home index (contains only home matches).

index.description: The home index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The team's position in the home index ranking.

awayIndex.description: The team's performance in the away index (contains only away matches).

index.description: The away index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents .

rank.description: The team's position in the away index ranking.

trend.description: The team's performance index trend in the main index valid at the requested date.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

count.description: The number of matches incorporated in the average.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

count.description: The number of matches incorporated in the average.

classification.description: A classification of the short-run in comparison to the long-run performance.

lastChange.description: Details about the last change of the team's main and venue index.

matchId.description: The unique identifier of the match that initiated the index change.

change.description: The change of the index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

opponent.description: The opponent's performance at the time of match start.

index.description: The opponent's main index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: N/A

venueIndex.description: The opponent's performance at the corresponding venue.

index.description: The index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: N/A

competition.description: The performance of the competition the match is related to.

index.description: The index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: N/A

lastMatch.description: Details about the match that changed the team's main and venue index the last time.

id.description: The unique identifier of the match. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the matchId parameter required by other operations.

start.description: The date when the match went or will go live.

schedule.description: The scheduled start of the match.

competitionStage.description: The competition stage this match is related to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the stage. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionStageId parameter required by other operations.

mode.description: The competition mode of the stage.

competition.description: The competition this stage is part of.

id.description: The unique identifier of the competition. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionId parameter required by other operations.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams).

homeTeam.description: The team competing at home ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

awayTeam.description: The team competing at away ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

time.description: The match time when these scores were valid.

home.description: The number of home team goals.

away.description: The number of away team goals.

api_list.name: Match Metrics
api_list.description:
Returns the metrics of a single match, a specific team or matches within a time span.

This is the main endpoint for retrieving match related figures such as performance ratios, expected and actual scores, statistically fair and market odds. The indication of projections controls which data should be collected and has direct impact on the payload and billed credits.

If no parameters are provided then the performance index of competing teams *(TI)*, expected goals *(XG)* and expected moneyline odds *(XM)* along with match details *(MD)* are returned for upcoming matches. The time span covering next matches ranges between 8 hours for *Basic* and 60 hours for paid subscriptions.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 1 minute`
`Max. matches returned: 3`

optional_parameters.name: maxStart
optional_parameters.description:
The upper bound of the time span in which matches may start (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: teamId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a team for which metrics should be evaluated. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: teamType
optional_parameters.description:
The type of teams for which the metrics should be evaluated (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `C` Club team, `N` National team
**Default**: C

optional_parameters.name: configurations
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `configuration` parameter. A comma-separated list of key/value pair configurations applied to selected projections (case-insensitive).

optional_parameters.name: acceptNoMetric
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether the response should include matches for which metrics are not available for the requested projections.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: projection
optional_parameters.description:
A single projection applied when building the result (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `MD` Match details, `TI` Team index, `TIV` Team venue index, `TIT` Team index trend, `CI` Competition index, `XG` Expected goals, `XS` Expected shots, `XC` Expected corners, `CG` Actual goals, `CS` Actual shots, `CC` Actual corners, `SP` Score probabilities, `XM` Expected moneyline, `XH` Expected handicaps, `XP` Expected points, `CM` Actual moneyline, `CH` Actual handicaps, `CP` Actual points

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#metrics-proj-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: minStart
optional_parameters.description:
The lower bound of the time span in which matches may start (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description:
The time zone used to interprete the `minStart` and `maxStart` parameters and to format date values in the API response.
**Default**: UTC

optional_parameters.name: competitionStageId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a competition stage for which metrics should be evaluated. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description:
A single key/value pair configuration applied to selected projections (case-insensitive).
**Pattern**: `{key}:{value}`
**Allowed keys**: `PIF` Performance index format, `XSQ` Expected scores quality, `SPM` Minimum scores probability, `OF` Odds format, `OL` Odds lines, `XOM` Expected odds margin. 

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#metric-attr-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: projections
optional_parameters.description:
Alternative to the `projection` parameter. A comma-separated list of projections applied when building the result (case-insensitive).
**Default**: MD,TI,XG,CG,XM

optional_parameters.name: matchId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a match for which the metrics should be evaluated. Use the `Get Matches` operation to find valid identifiers.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

result.description: A list of matches containing the requested metrics.

match.description: The match for which these metrics are valid.

id.description: The unique identifier of the match. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the matchId parameter required by other operations.

start.description: The date when the match went or will go live.

schedule.description: The scheduled start of the match.

competitionStage.description: The competition stage this match is related to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the stage. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionStageId parameter required by other operations.

mode.description: The competition mode of the stage.

competition.description: The competition this stage is part of.

id.description: The unique identifier of the competition. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the competitionId parameter required by other operations.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams).

homeTeam.description: The team competing at home ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

awayTeam.description: The team competing at away ground.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

time.description: The match time when these scores were valid.

home.description: The number of home team goals.

away.description: The number of away team goals.

performance.description: Metrics related to the performance of competing teams and competition.

format.description: The format used to present performance indices.

homeTeam.description: The performance metrics for the home team.

index.description: The main index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The team's position in the main index ranking.

venueIndex.description: The team's performance in the home index.

index.description: The index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The position in the index ranking.

trend.description: The team's performance index trend in the main index.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

count.description: The number of matches incorporated in the average.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

count.description: The number of matches incorporated in the average.

classification.description: A classification of the short-run in comparison to the long-run performance.

awayTeam.description: The performance metrics for the home team.

rank.description: The team's position in the main index ranking.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

classification.description: A classification of the short-run in comparison to the long-run performance.

competition.description: The performance of the competition the match is related to.

index.description: The index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The position in the index ranking.

scores.description: Metrics related to different types of match scores.

period.description: The match period for which metrics are valid.

quality.description: The quality of expected scores between 0 and 1. The higher the quality the more representative the expectation.

expected.description: The scores expected at the end of the match period.

expectedVenueAdvantage.description: The advantage incorporated in expected scores based on the venue were the teams compete.

actual.description: The final match scores at the end of the match period.

probabilities.description: A list of scores probabilities. Each item reflects the expected probability for match scores at the end of the match period.

home.description: The number of home team scores.

away.description: The number of away team scores.

probability.description: The probability of these scores to be final.

quality.description: The quality of expected scores between 0 and 1. The higher the quality the more representative the expectation.

expected.description: The scores expected at the end of the match period.

expectedVenueAdvantage.description: The advantage incorporated in expected scores based on the venue were the teams compete.

actual.description: The final match scores at the end of the match period.

quality.description: The quality of expected scores between 0 and 1. The higher the quality the more representative the expectation.

expected.description: The scores expected at the end of the match period.

expectedVenueAdvantage.description: The advantage incorporated in expected scores based on the venue were the teams compete.

actual.description: The final match scores at the end of the match period.

period.description: The match period for which metrics are valid.

quality.description: The quality of expected odds between 0 and 1. The higher the quality the more representative the expectation.

expected.description: Expected (fair) odds derived from scores models.

home.description: The odds that the final home score is greater than the away score.

away.description: The odds that the final away score decreased by the line is greater than the home score.

api_list.name: Top Match Metrics
api_list.description:
Returns the metrics of matches with top values regarding a certain metric.

This is the premium endpoint for goal-oriented search of match related figures and is available only for the *Mega* subscription. It allows custom logic for match selection and supports functions used to join metrics. Finding the teams with highest conversion rates or market lines with the highest discrepancies to statistical odds are simple tasks by means of this operation.

Furthermore, it may save you credits in comparison to the *Match Metrics* operation as only a filtered subset will be fetched. By default, the Top-10 upcoming matches are returned. Historical top searches are supported for specific teams and competition stages as well.

Note that testing this endpoint with the *Basic* subscription will result in a 403 HTTP error (Forbidden). Instead, refer to the [docs](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#get-/match-metrics/top) to learn about the features offered by the endpoint.

required_parameters.name: metric
required_parameters.description:
An individual metric or expression that describes the top criteria used to sort matches. Expressions support functions, metrics and decimal numbers for custom calculation.

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#metric-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: projection
optional_parameters.description:
A single projection applied when building the result (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `MD` Match details, `TI` Team index, `TIV` Team venue index, `TIT` Team index trend, `CI` Competition index, `XG` Expected goals, `XS` Expected shots, `XC` Expected corners, `CG` Actual goals, `CS` Actual shots, `CC` Actual corners, `SP` Score probabilities, `XM` Expected moneyline, `XH` Expected handicaps, `XP` Expected points, `CM` Actual moneyline, `CH` Actual handicaps, `CP` Actual points

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#metrics-proj-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
The order used to sort matches by relevance (case-insensitive).
Allowed: `ASC` Ascending, `DESC` Descending
**Default**: DESC

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
A single metric/operator/metric triple building a predicate that must be true in order to evalute a match.

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#get-/match-metrics/top) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: projections
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `projection` parameter. A comma-separated list of projections applied when building the result (case-insensitive).

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description:
The time when matches to evaluate start(ed).
**Allowed**: `P` Past, `U` Upcoming
**Default**: U

optional_parameters.name: configurations
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `configuration` parameter. A comma-separated list of key/value pair configurations applied to selected projections (case-insensitive).

optional_parameters.name: competitionStageId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a competition stage for which metrics should be evaluated. Use the `Get Competitions` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description:
A single key/value pair configuration applied to selected projections (case-insensitive).
Pattern: `{key}:{value}`
Allowed keys: `PIF` Performance index format, `XSQ` Expected scores quality, `SPM` Minimum scores probability, `OF` Odds format, `OL` Odds lines, `XOM` Expected odds margin. 

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#metric-attr-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: maxCount
optional_parameters.description:
The maximum number of match metrics returned.
**Default**: 10

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `filter` parameter. A comma-separated list of metric/operator/metric triples building predicates that must be true in order to evalute a match.

optional_parameters.name: teamId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier of a team for which metrics should be evaluated. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

result.description: A list of matches containing the requested metrics.

match.description: The match for which these metrics are valid.

start.description: The date when the match went or will go live.

competition.description: The competition this stage is part of.

domestic.description: Status whether the competition is hold in a single country (commonly for club teams).

api_list.name: Team Performance Index History
api_list.description:
Returns the history of a team's performance index. Each datapoint represents an index change based on a match performance. The indication of projections controls which data should be collected and has direct impact on the payload and billed credits.

There is one obligatory parameter which identifies the team of the trend. If no more parameters are provided then the trend for the last year's performance (*Basic* subscriptions: one month) is returned with only the main index projection in absolute index format. For details about index calculation and factors refer to the documentation.

For free subscriptions the following limits apply:

`Max. requests per hour: 20`
`Min. time between requests: 1 minute`
`Max. time span returned: 1 month`

required_parameters.name: teamId
required_parameters.description: The identifier of the team for which the performances should be collected. Use the `Get Teams` operation to find valid identifiers.

optional_parameters.name: estimateBill
optional_parameters.description:
Flag whether a cost estimate should be returned for the above parameters instead of the result.
**Default**: false

optional_parameters.name: projection
optional_parameters.description:
A single projection applied when building the result (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `I` Main index, `VI` Venue index, `IT` Index trend, `LIC` Last index change, `LMD` Last match details
**Default**: I

Refer to [API reference](https://docs.metrxfactory.io/#team-pfm-idx-proj-enum) for further details.

optional_parameters.name: minDate
optional_parameters.description:
The lower bound of the history's time span (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: maxDate
optional_parameters.description:
The upper bound of the history's time span (inclusive).
**Pattern**: `yyyy-MM-dd['T'HH:mm]`

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description:
The time zone used to interpret the `minDate` and `maxDate` parameters.
**Default**: UTC

optional_parameters.name: projections
optional_parameters.description: Alternative to the `projection` parameter. A comma-separated list of projections applied when building the result (case-insensitive).

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
The format applied to index values (case-insensitive).
**Allowed**: `ABS` Absolute, `REL` Relative.
**Default**: ABS
BASIC subscriptions support only `ABS`.

success.description: Status whether the query was successful.

charge.description: The number of credits charged for this response.

estimate.description: The number of credits expected to be charged for a query with the very same parameters. Available if the estimateBill parameter was set to true whereby this cost estimate is returned instead of the result.

result.description: The history of the team's performance in the requested index format.

format.description: The index format used to present performance indices.

team.description: The team this history belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the teamId parameter required by other operations.

type.description: The type of team correlating to national status.

country.description: The country which the team comes from.

id.description: The unique identifier of the country. A Base64 encoded UUID to be used for the countryId parameter required by other operations.

entries.description: The history entries sorted by date in ascending order.

date.description: The date when this performance was valid.

index.description: The main index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The team's position in the main index ranking.

homeIndex.description: The team's performance in the home index (contains only home matches).

rank.description: The team's position in the home index ranking.

awayIndex.description: The team's performance in the away index (contains only away matches).

index.description: The away index value in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

rank.description: The team's position in the away index ranking.

trend.description: The team's performance index trend in the main index valid at the requested date.

averageChange.description: The average change in the main index in terms of absolute points or relation to opponents.

count.description: The number of matches incorporated in the average.
